name: American Indian Center of Indiana (AICI)
category: American-Indian-owned Primary care physicians in Indiana
description: Promotes the empowerment of American Indians/Alaska Natives in Indiana for personal, social, cultural, and economic growth. They offer resources and support to the community
services: American-Indian-owned Primary care physicians in Indiana consultation

name: Indian Health Service (IHS)
category: American-Indian-owned Primary care physicians in Indiana
description: The IHS is responsible for providing federal health services to American Indians and Alaska Natives. While they operate facilities, they are a government agency, not a private business. Their website has a "Find Health Care" tool to locate IHS, Tribal, or Urban Indian Health Program facilities
services: American-Indian-owned Primary care physicians in Indiana consultation
